name: From Dawn till Dusk
description:
Gameplay Instructions for Team 10

Controls:

Use A or D to move around. E will soon be implemented for interaction

Planned Objects:

Currently still in the works but Hiding, Exploration, Staying away from Darkness, Try not to be caught are our main elements to this game.

Any Other Useful/Important information:

This project is still in the works. Updates will be implemented regularly till the deadline of the end of this week. Currently have basic movement, camera control set up with idle of character and background. Soon to have camera constraints ready and player animations.  There is a bug where you can go super speed if you full screen the game.
